name: Project Test
description:
IMPORTANT MESSAGE!

Project Wo is a prototype. The game can be scrapped any moment. If you guys enjoy I will keep working on the game. If its not liked that much the project can be scrapped any moment! To be notified when it launches, We are releasing new updates on Itch.io as we are working towards a Steam Early Access release. To read more about this announcement, visit our Blog! (Blog is still being made)

Your ideas and suggestions are always valuable to us and we will continue to read what you post in our forums as well as over on Twitter. Thank you!
